name: Dots eXtreme Demo
description:
Classic dots puzzle with new level of difficulty. We designed more than 300 unique levels with size range from 10x10 to 20x20 cells. All these levels come roughly under four categories.

Tutorial

30 tutorial levels will help you to understand how to play the game and get some Tokens. There is no real currency in the game, but you can use Tokens to buy game Skins and tips.

Easy

  • 10x10
  • 12x12

Normal

  • 14x14
  • 16x16

Hard

  • 18x18
  • 20x20

There are also special cells featured, which changes classic puzzle gameplay and adding extra possibilities.
  • Wall is blocking the cell;
  • Tube is limiting line direction to horizontal or vertical when it passes the cell;
  • Crossing allowing multiple lines to pass through the cell;
